author: ahinzmann
body:
#### PR description:

Followup from #28659 and #28077 @rappoccio 

This PR computes puppi weights and puppi AK4 and AK8 jets in RECO and stores the PUPPI weight as a value map. PUPPI jets are clustered based on standard PF candidates together with the value map of weights. The packed candidates pick up this value map such that puppi does not need to be re-computed in MiniAOD.

The same can be done for the puppiNoLep and PUPPI MET in a separate PR (to keep this one as slim as possible).

Removing AK8CHS from RECO
Removing CMSTopTagger from RECO

#### PR validation:

runTheMatrix -l limited

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

No backport planned.
title: PUPPI jets in RECO
